page.title: 14HOUSING AND RESIDENTIAL
page.content: HOLDENBY. NO NEW BUILDINGS HAVE BEEN BUILT THERE FOR MANY A YEAR. MOST OF THE OLDER PROPERTIES HAVE BEEN MODERNISEDD. ANY THAT FALL VACANT ARE USUALLY VERY HIGHLY PRICED, THEY ARE MAINLY ESTATE COTTAGES BELONGING TO EARL SPENCER, WHO HAS NOW GAINED PRESTIGE THROUGH MARRIAGE INTO THE ROYAL FAMILY. SPRATTON. IN THE LAST TEN OR MORE YEARS TWO FAIRLY LARGE ESTATES OF PRIVATE HOUSING HAVE BEEN ERECTED. THESE WOULD FETCH AROUND 3O,OOO EACH. BECAUSE OF THIS LOTS OF YOUNG FAMILIES HAVE SETTLED IN THE VILLAGE. HIGHER PRICED PROPERTIES ARE MAINLY IN-FILL AND TEND TO BE OWNED BY PROFESSIONAL CLASSES, WHO COMMUTE INTO NORTHAMPTON OR POSSIBLY FURTHER AFIELD. ON THE WHOLE ABOUT TWO THIRDS OF HOUSES ARE PRIVATELY OWNED AND ONE THIRD BELONG TO THE COUNCIL.
